alert.note: Alert for Brooks; Lowndes (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 14 at 11:22AM EST until February 18 at 11:01AM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Tallahassee FL has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Georgia... Withlacoochee River near Quitman (US 84) affecting Lowndes and Brooks Counties. For the Withlacoochee River...including Quitman (US 84)...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY EVENING TO LATE SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Withlacoochee River near Quitman (US 84). * WHEN...From Wednesday evening to late Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...At 104.0 feet, In Lowndes County, Spook Bridge Lane begins to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:00 AM EST Tuesday the stage was 101.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tomorrow evening to a crest of 104.5 feet early Friday morning. It will then fall below flood stage late Friday evening. - Flood stage is 104.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 104.5 feet on 04/22/1947. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 530 AM EST.
